message: Interesting idea, but do you mean *physical* door?  As in, bricks and mortar?  Or is this for when someone signs up on a website?

How do you know who's influential when they sign up for your service? You don't. Swaydar, a Startup Weekend startup, notifies you when a socially influential person signs up for your email list. Check out http://Swaydar.com
Sounds good, I'll have to check it out
@mgkimsal  @Gafgarian420 Yep, offline and online, know any developers?
